text: -tIqmAmEqvEShTa#kAM kRuqtvOpa# dhaqttE&na#tidAhAya praqjApa#tirakAmayataq prajA#yEqyEtiq sa EqtamuKya#mapaSyaqt ta(gm) sa#M~Mvathsaqrama#biBaqstatO# vai sa prAjA#yataq tasmA$th saM~MvathsaqraM BAqrya#H praiva jA#yatEq taM ~Mvasa#vO&bruvaqn pra tvama#janiShThA vaqyaM prajA#yAmahAq itiq taM ~Mvasu#ByaqH prAya#cCaqt taM trINyahA$nyabiBaruqstEnaq - [  ] 12
